headline: Goldman Americas ECM Head Gelman to Exit After 25 Years at Firm
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Gabe Gelman, head of Americas equity capital markets at Goldman Sachs Group Inc., is leaving the firm after more than 25 years, according to people with knowledge of the matter. headline: Invesco Short Term Bond Fund Q4 2024 Commentary

headline: Pendulum, Landrock buy 505 North Brand Boulevard for $56M
summary: Pendulum Property Partners' Daniel Wagman with 505 North Brand Boulevard (Pendulum Property Partners, Google Maps, Getty)Pendulum Property Partners and Chicago-based Landrock snapped up a discounted 15-story office building in Glendale, The Real Deal has learned. The partners paid about $56 million, or roughly $170 per square foot, to buy 505 North Brand Boulevard from Cruzan and Goldman Sachs Private Real […]This article originally appeared on The Real Deal.
